thread.section_title: TelephoneJamaica.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TelephoneJamaica.com | telephonejamaica.com
thread.title: Marcea Jones

author: Marcea Jones
title: Marcea Jones
text: I've tried numerous websites but got disappointments one after another. TelephoneJamaica.com is the best website for calling love ones any where in the world. They even offer services for text messages. I can recharge a family member's cell phone Digicel or Flow. No one else offers that service from Italy to Jamaica. What else could i ask for. It's fast and riliable. One thing though, local phone credit is being used at the same time. I hope it'll be upgraded to WIFI connections, this way only one payment will be made from my pockets. Thanks for offering such great services at such a reasonable price.
